    • getRowCol

      public List<SkyscrapersCell> getRowCol(int index, SkyscrapersType type, boolean isRow)
      Gets the cells of a certain type in a given row/column
      Parameters:
      index - : y pos of row or x pos of col,
      type - of cell to collect,
      isRow - true if row, false if col
      Returns:
      list of cells of the given type, ordered west to east or north to south
